Kim Jong Il's work published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's work published in Italy
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On having a correct viewpoint and understanding of the Juche philosophy" was brought out in booklet by the Firenze, Italy, group for the study of the Juche idea to commemorate the Day of the Sun and the army founding anniversary.
 In a preface the booklet says: publishing the work the group stresses that it is important for all countries to conduct activities on the principles of the Juche philosophy.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Workers' Party of Turkey
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Workers' Party of Turkey
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Workers' Party of Turkey on the occasion of the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
 The gift was handed to an official concerned by Yalsin Buyukdagli, member of the Political Bureau of the central committee of the Party, on a visit to the DPRK.

DPRK delegation leaves for South Africa
articles.content:
DPRK delegation leaves for South Africa
    Pyongyang, April 20 (KCNA) - A DPRK delegation led by Choe Su Hon, vice-minister of foreign affairs, left here yesterday by air to participate in the ministerial meeting of the coordinating committee of the non-aligned movement to be held in Durban, South Africa.
